name: uasabi_static_site
description: A static site for Uasabi Ltd

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run initiate-html && npm run uglify
scripts.initiate-html: npm run inline:css && npm run minify:html
scripts.inline:css: rm -rf dist/index.html && critical src/index.html --minify --inline --base src/ > dist/index.html

author: E Keane
